response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product offers unparalleled benefits and capabilities that can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional features and the value it provides, we believe it is worth more than its face value of $15,000. Considering its true worth and the unique opportunity it presents, I am extending an exclusive offer to you to acquire this product at a special price of $18,000. This offer is valid for a limited time only, and I hope we can discuss the details further to ensure you understand the full potential of this investment. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 18000}
